Property.Value: -- ============================================= -- Author: Daniel Floca -- Create date: 2018-10-25 -- Description: Stored procedure to delete card -- ============================================= CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[spDeleteCard] @CardId INT AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
HeaderContents
Property.Value: -- ============================================= -- Author: Daniel Floca -- Create date: 2018-10-27 -- Description: Stored procedure to delete a deck -- ============================================= CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[spDeleteDeck] @DeckId INT AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
SET NOCOUNT ON;
SELECT * FROM dbo.Cards WHERE Id = @CardId AND (IsDeleted = 0 OR IsDeleted IS NULL)
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: -- ============================================= -- Author: Daniel Floca -- Create date: 2018-10-20 -- Description: Stored procedure to retrieve a card -- ============================================= CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[spGetCard] @CardId INT AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
SET NOCOUNT ON;
SELECT * FROM dbo.Decks WHERE Id = @DeckId AND (IsDeleted = 0 OR IsDeleted IS NULL)
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: -- ============================================= -- Author: Daniel Floca -- Create date: 2018-10-26 -- Description: Stored procedure to retrieve a deck -- ============================================= CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[spGetDeck] @DeckId INT AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
SET NOCOUNT ON;
SELECT * FROM dbo.Users WHERE Id = @UserId AND (IsDeleted = 0 OR IsDeleted IS NULL)
END
